original_body_lines: An underworld figure known as 'Dunumala Sarath' has been shot dead at the Dunumalawaththa area in Galapitamada, Warakapola.
Police said he was shot at this morning while travelling in a cab by unidentified men.
The victim died on the spot and police are investigating to arrest the suspects.
It was reported that 'Dunumala Sarath' was an accused in a murder committed in 2015.
